reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's fit, comfort, and quality, with one noting it's not baggy and another mentioning the ribbed texture adds sophistication. The dress is flattering, showing off curves perfectly and complementing figures, and customers find it comfortable and sexy to wear. The material thickness receives mixed feedback - while some find it nice, others describe it as very thin fabric. The sheerness aspect is also mixed, with some saying it's not too see-through while others find the white version particularly transparent. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Husband Approved
items.body: Flattering, Comfortable, and Husband Approved! I am absolutely thrilled with the Samefar Women's Ribbed Scoop Neck Sleeveless Tank Dress – it's a definite 5-star winner in my wardrobe! I was looking for a versatile dress that I could wear out for dinner, and this one hit every mark. Firstly, the material is fantastic. It's got a lovely fabric which immediately made me feel more confident about wearing it. Despite being a bodycon style, it's absolutely not see-through, even in direct light, which is a huge plus. The ribbed texture adds a nice touch of sophistication without being overly casual. Secondly, the fit is true to size. I ordered my usual size, and it hugs my curves beautifully without feeling restrictive. It's incredibly comfortable to wear, allowing me to move freely and feel confident all evening. And finally, the best part: my husband absolutely loves it, and I love to wear it out with him! It's become one of his favorite dresses on me, and I feel fantastic every time I put it on for a date night. It's chic, flattering, and makes me feel great. If you're looking for a comfortable, stylish, and confidence-boosting mini dress for your next outing, especially a special one, look no further. This dress is a must-have! Read more
items.author: sarahr

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!!!!
items.body: Adorable!! This dress is so cute. Very soft and has stretch so molds to the body perfectly. I am 5’2” 100 lbs got a small. It’s a perfect fit, great summer dress can be worn with heels or flats or even sneakers for a more casual look. Love, love it! Read more
items.author: LMP101

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and very form fitting
items.body: It’s thinner than I hoped but still very comfortable. I’m 5’4, 190lbs (+/-) and I ordered an XL. I feel like it’s fairly versatile as you could easily style it with like a denim jacket or something. It’s form-fitting but not clingy. I personally don’t think it’s super flattering on me, but my husband likes it (of course LOL) so I’m keeping it for maybe just around the house stuff. I took photos in bright light and a darker spot to show if it’s see through. For reference I have a hot pink bag stuck in the top and bright purple underwear on and you can’t really tell all that easily. So, I think it works. Read more
items.author: MB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & Comfortable
items.body: 5’5 148 and medium fit perfectly. It was very comfortable and flattering. I’ll probably buy other colors. If it wasn’t a pattern, I think it would have been see through. Read more
items.author: Kathy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy short dress
items.author: Imani

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks used and discolored
items.body: Purchased for a cruise as a swim cover up. This dress is cute and very comfortable however when I opened this and put it on along the area by the chest it appears like the color is faded in some spots. My guess is this dress is dyed and it was done poorly. I would buy again however I would lean towards the white one so its not dyed, however even those from other reviews looked like they were sewn wrong. Unfortunately, I have to return as I don't want a dress that starts out looking washed and worn. Material has no structure, it's is of soft ribbed almost t-shirt material so if your looking for something to shape your problem areas this is not the dress. I'm 5'2" 135lbs and ordered a small in color blue A. The fit was prefect on me and would make a very comfortable swim cover up. Read more
items.author: Crystal Maribito

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, comfy dress
items.body: LOVE THIS DRESS!!! Its comfy, stretchy, and can be dressed up a little or just worn around the house. Its tight, but stretchy - doesnt hide much tho. But man oh man its comfy! Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not Worth It
items.body: I've always heard of packages coming with strong smells and thought, "Calm down and wash it!" As soon as I opened this dress, the most pungent stink of burning tires and hair hit me. Then, I noticed a stain on it (see pics). I really thought I could will it to work, so I went ahead and washed it. It stunk worse after a wash, so I washed it a second time. Still staaaanky. Washed it a third time and used scent (which I am allergic to but desperate times, friends). I hung it to dry and I could still smell a faint musk of tire fire. After hanging in my closet a few days, I thought I'd give it a whirl. Much to my dismay, the stain didn't come out with several washes. I went ahead and wore the dress out anyway because I didn't have anywhere super important to be. Once I got outside in the Texas heat of May, the stink of the dress revived. It took me a second to even figure out what it was. Also, the colors on the dress just fade when the ribbing is stretched. Even the slightest bit. You could get a much better dress of the same style at Target for about half the price. I'm not even sure why I got this dress. I can't return it now because I've washed it several times. Oh, and the stripes don't match up. The seam is atrocious. Take a look at these pics. If I had paid like 15 bucks for the dress I wouldn't care, but for $30? Do better. Read more
items.author: napalmolive

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: E Wrap Green, A Camouflage a, A Blue a, A Pink, A Purple, A Stripd Yellow, A Yellow, E Wrap Black, G Wine Red, E Wrap Wine Red, G Black, A Gray, A Red a, H Blue B. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
